name: df-submgm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(csubmgm, cmpt(s0, cmgm, crab(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)))))))
comment: A submagma is a subset of a magma which is closed under the operation. Such subsets are themselves magmas. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
